system.description: The character has learned to channel corrupted energy through their cybernetic implants, granting their Luminen abilities psychic force.
system.benefit: The Character's Luminen Shock and Luminen Blast Talents gain the Force Quality. If the character fails the Focus Power Test to activate this Force Quality, they suffer 1d5 Energy Damage not reduced by Armour and Toughness.

specialAbilities.name: Corrupted Luminen Enhancement
specialAbilities.description: Luminen Shock and Luminen Blast gain the Force Quality. On failed Focus Power Test for Force, suffer 1d5 Energy Damage (not reduced by Armour/Toughness).
